manifest.name: Explain Selection With AI
manifest.description: Use an OpenAI Chat Completion API-compatible LLM endpoint to explain the selected text in greater detail.
manifest.author: Ben Wurster

data.manifestValue: Use an OpenAI Chat Completion API-compatible LLM endpoint to explain the selected text in greater detail.
data.communityListValue: Use an OpenAI Chat Completion API-compatible LLM endpoint to expand on selected text in the context of your notes.
